answers.answer: I don't know what HELLP syndrome is, but your other symptoms sound very much like Cushing's syndrome.  It takes an ACTH test to confirm it and usually ultrasound of the adrenal glands.  Basically the adrenal gland is producing too much cortisol which leads to the weight gain, usually elevated alkaline phosphatase, often elevated glucose, and often elevated liver enzymes and very very often fatty liver.  It sounds like time to see an endocrinologist to me
